I

initSearchFrom(Activity) - Method in class com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.InstantSearchHelper
Initialize search from the given activity according to its searchable info.
InstantSearchHelper - Class in com.algolia.instantsearch.ui
Uses the Searcher to react to changes in your application's interface, like when your user types a new query or interacts with Widgets.
InstantSearchHelper(Activity, Searcher) - Constructor for class com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.InstantSearchHelper
Create and initialize the helper, then link it to the given Activity.
InstantSearchHelper(Activity, Menu, int, Searcher) - Constructor for class com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.InstantSearchHelper
Create and initialize the helper, then link it to the given Activity and Menu's searchView.
InstantSearchHelper(AlgoliaWidget, Searcher) - Constructor for class com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.InstantSearchHelper
Create and initialize the helper, then link it to the given widget.
ItemClickSupport - Class in com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.utils
Helper to set onItem[Long]Click listeners on a RecyclerView.
ItemClickSupport.OnItemClickListener - Interface in com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.utils
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item has been clicked.
ItemClickSupport.OnItemLongClickListener - Interface in com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.utils
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item has been clicked and held.
